text:
Jill Zarin is a real estate agent and reality television personality who has a net worth of $35 million. Jill Zarin has accumulated her net worth through her time spent in real estate and also as a marketer for her husbands company, Zarin Fabric Warehouse and Home Furnishings, and while she appeared on the Bravo reality series, The Real Housewives of New York City. Jill is married to Bobby Zarin and has a daughter, Allyson, from a previous marriage. She also has a stepson, Johnathan, who is an up and coming actor. Jill Zarin was a regular cast member on Real Housewives of New York City since the very first season until season five. She continues to appear regularly on a wide variety of national talk shows to address topics as diverse as politics, style, advice, and her Jill Zarin brand. She is a devoted mom, wife and very busy businesswoman. She also works very hard on raising money for Arthritic Diseases, which is an ailment that has hit too close to home. Their daughter, Allyson, and her stepson, Johnathan suffer from this painful disease. She has made it her mission to raise money for Arthritis Research and do what she can to help those living with this disease, to manage their lives.

Jill Zarin was born in Woodmere, New York, to Sol and Gloria Kamen, and has one sister, Lisa Wexler. Jill was raised in Woodmere and attended Simmons College School of Retail Management. After graduating, Jill got a job at Filenes, as an assistant buyer and moved on to become Vice President of Great American Knitting Mills Jockey Division, as well as being their National Sales Manager. Between her many business endeavors, her charity work, her campaign for Arthritic Diseases and more, she's kept quite busy. She has also co-written a book entitled, "Secrets of a Jewish Mother," with her mom,Gloria Kamen (who has appeared several times on Real Housewives} and her sister, radio show host, Lisa Wexlar. This book gives advice on everything from dating and marriage, to money situations.

As we all know, many actresses, actors and socialites are going under the knife, for that make me youthful look. Jill Zarin has discovered a less extreme way to get a face lift. She swears by her liquid face lift procedures and a little botox, now and then, mostly for the neck, forehead and between the eyes area. This liquid facelift is done with injections of Restylane, injected into the jaw and sides of her face. She also has a make up artist, Jim Crawford, to give her the appearance of having a smaller nose by adding a brown contouring makeup, and gave her face a thinner appearance, through air brushing. It definitely seems to be working for Jill.

Jill Zarin is also an actress and has appeared in several television sitcoms, such as, The Bonnie Hunt Show, White Collar, and the Spin Crowd. She has also appeared on game shows, The Apprentice and Who Wants to be a Millionaire, as well as, talk shows, and news programs, such as, the Today Show. She also appeared on the hit reality television series, Celebrity Wife Swap in 2014 where she traded lives with Jenna von Oy who is probably best known for her role as "Six" in Blossom.
